sentences.sentence: Why waste precious time dreaming when waking life is so much better?
sentences.translation: 在醒着的生活是如此美好的时候，为何要把时间浪费在做梦上呢？

sentences.sentence: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
sentences.translation: 生活的一成是发生在我身上的事情，剩下的九成取决于我如何应对。

sentences.sentence: You can know everything in the world, but the only way you're findin' out that one is by givin' it a shot.
sentences.translation: 你可以了解世间万物，但追根溯源的唯一途径便是亲身尝试。

sentences.sentence: Risk nothing, or you'll gain nothing.
It is never too late to give up our prejudices.
sentences.translation: 放弃偏见，永远不会太迟。
